use_cases.case: The sequence of Haloterrigena jeotgali A29 plasmid unnamed6 (CP031304) was used as the reference in a phylogenetic analysis of DndCD and PbeAC sequences.
The sequence of Haloterrigena jeotgali A29 plasmid unnamed6 (CP031304) was used in a study of the diversity of phosphorothioate (PT) systems in prokaryotes.
